TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConstContainerRandomAccessIterator`1<TValue> extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IRandomAccessIterator`1<!TValue>
Public Class ConstContainerRandomAccessIterator(Of TValue) Implements IRandomAccessIterator(Of TValue)
generic <typename TValue> public ref class ConstContainerRandomAccessIterator : Microsoft::VisualC::StlClr::Generic::IRandomAccessIterator<TValue>

summary.span: 提供支援下列作業的迭代器：呼叫 operator++ 來往前移動一個位置、呼叫 operator-- 來往後移動一個位置、使用 operator[] 來存取元素，以及使用指標算術來存取元素。

span.span: Provides an iterator that supports the following operations: moving forward one position by calling operator++, moving backward one position by calling operator--, accessing an element by using operator[], and accessing an element by using pointer arithmetic.

summary.span: Iterator 所指向的項目無法修改。

span.span: The element pointed to by the iterator cannot be modified.
